['DescriptionThis 4-bedroom Type 3 villa in Phase 2 of Sidra has a plot size over 6,000 sq ft. it is a fantastic family home and we are delighted to present this to our most discerning clients who want to live in one of Dubai’s best new communities.
Key features of the home:
• Contemporary design with the practical interior layout
• Ground floor guest room
• Maid’s room
• Open plan living with dining and kitchen
• Family room on the first floor
• Easy access close to entrance and exit
• Spacious en-suite bedrooms
• Large backyard with space to set up outdoor dining
• Large parking bay and driveway space
• Priced to sell, below the Original Price 
With well-designed landscaping and quiet tree-lined streets offering easy access to community amenities, this is a community that any family would be glad to call home. International schools, hospitals, a shopping mall, a retail promenade, restaurants, a championship golf course, parks, and community areas are all a part of the Dubai Hills master plan, so there is always something to do for children and adults alike.
Please contact me for a viewing of this splendid villa.']

title_advert: ['Well Maintained Villa | Type 2M | Mira 3 in Reem']
descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is proud to present this masterpiece of elegant 3 bedroom townhouse villa with maid's room in Mira 3, Reem for sale.
This unit is located in the heart of Dubai Renowned Emaar's Reem community. This villa is spacious 2M unit, very spacious and well renowned community at a very competitive price. The unit also contains a maids room and very close to an exit to get easy access in and out of the community. This unit is also single row withe a private garden.
Reem community offers a modern interpretation of the soothing charm of the desert oasis. 
Residents will become part of an exotic neighbourhood that features an exclusive desert botanical park, with camping facilities, sand surfing,  camel riding trails; go carting track and dune buggies a short ride away. In addition, residents will have direct access to jogging paths and the Al Qudra cycle path spanning over 80 km.
As the communities mature residents will be able to enjoy the many communal parks and gardens as well as residents's club, restaurants and cafes, football, basketball and volleyball pitches, children’s play areas, skate park and an amphitheatre outdoor cinema all set within the neighbourhoods.
Adding to the leisure choices of residents, Reem development in Dubai is in close proximity to the Arabian Ranches Golf Club, Dubai Polo & Equestrian Club, and Global Village.
Reem is inspired by nature, and promises a refreshing lifestyle with the landscaping placing equal emphasis on greenery and sandy desert escape."]
